title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until tender. In a bowl, whisk eggs with cheese, salt, and pepper. Cook the bacon, then mix the pasta with the mixture and serve hot.
